response.original_title: Paid to Play: Understanding College Sports
response.overview: The concept of the “student-athlete” who plays purely for the love of their school is officially a relic of the past. College sports has become a full-blown professional enterprise, and this special from E:60 aims to make sense of the chaotic new landscape. The era of amateurism is over, replaced by a billion-dollar industry
response.title: Paid to Play: Understanding College Sports
